data.text: @DylanReeve It's quite disgusting- seeing g a massive human tragedy hijacked and excused due to some QAnon conspiracy theories
@UtterlyAghast @DylanReeve @publicaddress Hope they are OK...it's terrible they took kids.....
@DylanReeve I'm sure the Pro-Russian sentiment eill eventually emerge- there is an idea that Putin is invading Ukraine to provide the death blow to a 'cabal' stronghold.
@DylanReeve @publicaddress First covid positive diagnosis at my children's school last week. Turns out the child had been taken to the protest.
@DylanReeve No covid, just radiation burns/poisoning...not sure that's an improvement...
@PakehaAotearoan @DylanReeve Guess they’ve been reading the works of a former English footballer and believing him. 🤦‍♀️

@DylanReeve " They're shooting radiation rays in to our frontal lobes to give us headaches!!"

Or... you're dehydrated from shuffling around to BBQ reggae in the sun for 8 days and drinking very little water, Kyle.

@DylanReeve That's how they roll.

Invent a bogeyman. Blame bogeyman. Feel validation. Dopamine. Repeat.
